To The Grave: The Wildlands of Faenora

name: To The Grave: The Wildlands of Faenora
storyline:
In the heart of Faenora, a realm where magic and might intertwine, your hero rises to forge their name as a Faenoran legend. Drawn by tales of a fearsome Gryphon, you, the hero, embark on a quest for glory and adventure. Armed with an enchanted Phoenix Amulet that protects you from the lasting embrace of death, you set out with a band of loyal companions and venture into the untamed Wildlands to hunt the Gryphon.

What other secrets might you uncover along the way?

The fate of Faenora lies in your hands.
summary: Inspired by strategy RPG classics, To The Grave: The Wildlands of Faenora is a roguelite tactical RPG where you lead a customizable squad in turn-based combat, navigating dynamic paths, battling mythical creatures, and discovering epic loot in a pixel art medieval fantasy world.
